serialencoder

Class SerialEncoderImplXSTREAMXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • serialencoder.SerialEncoderImpl
      • serialencoder.SerialEncoderImplXSTREAMXML
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, SerialEncoder

    public class SerialEncoderImplXSTREAMXML
extends SerialEncoderImpl
implements Serializable
    Uses XStream http://xstream.codehaus.org/ to serialize to XML format. Note that XStream does not require the Object to implement Serializable.
    Since:
    12 March 2015
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerialEncoderImplXSTREAMXML() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object decode(String xml)
      Decodes a string containing XML encoding created by encode(Object obj) recovering the Object.
      String encode(Object obj)
      Uses XStream and XML to convert the supplied obj to a string so that it can be subsequently recovered by decode(String str).

      • Methods inherited from class serialencoder.SerialEncoderImpl

        retreiveFromFile, saveToFile

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public String encode(Object obj)
        Uses XStream and XML to convert the supplied obj to a string so that it can be subsequently recovered by decode(String str).
        Specified by:
        encode in interface SerialEncoder
        Specified by:
        encode in class SerialEncoderImpl
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to encode (does NOT need to implement Serializable)).
        Returns:
        encoded String containing information about the object in XML format.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is any problem encoding the object

      • decode

        public Object decode(String xml)
        Decodes a string containing XML encoding created by encode(Object obj) recovering the Object.
        Specified by:
        decode in interface SerialEncoder
        Specified by:
        decode in class SerialEncoderImpl
        Parameters:
        xml - the String to decode
        Returns:
        the object encoded in str.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is any problem decoding the string
